synopsis.text:
To the average student at Itan Private High School, Shoko Komi is the epitome of grace and beauty, a girl who effortlessly captures everyone's attention. However, beneath her enchanting exterior lies a secret struggle: Komi grapples with severe social anxiety and finds it nearly impossible to communicate with others.

On his first day of high school, Hitohito Tadano, a boy who values blending in above all else, finds himself in an unexpected situation when he ends up sitting next to Komi. As the envy of his classmates grows, Tadano stumbles upon Komi's hidden struggle and becomes the first person to truly understand her.

When Tadano learns of Komi's heartfelt desire to make one hundred friends, he decides to support her in her quest. Through written conversations on the classroom blackboard, Tadano and Komi begin to form a unique bond. As they work together to help Komi overcome her anxiety and connect with others, Tadano finds himself becoming an integral part of her journey towards friendship.

Join Tadano and Komi in this heartwarming tale of self-discovery, growth, and the true meaning of friendship as they navigate the challenges of high school and work towards Komi's dream of making one hundred friends.
